name: Orbital Upload (Global Game Jam 2018)
description: Game Jam game made with: George White (UI/Game Concept), Lysle Shields  (Programmer), Ran Crump (Programmer),   David Zagardo (Sound), and Adam Godsy (Artist). Leader board system won't work on itch.io for security reasons. If you would like to view and play for leader board scores please download the executable file: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/orbital-upload
